snippet: The head of the Russian energy giant said that if the E.U. angled for a single price for its natural gas, it would likely be at higher end of the current spectrum.

byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: The head of the Russian energy giant said that if the E.U. angled for a single price for its natural gas, it would likely be at higher end of the current spectrum.

headline.main: Gazprom Warns Europe Over Price of Natural Gas
headline.print_headline: Gazprom Warns Europe Over Price of Natural Gas
